summary: This is a calendar entry documenting a scheduled phone call between Linda Singer and the DOJ regarding the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The call was scheduled for October 5, 2020, and is marked as personal.

persons.name: Linda Singer
persons.context: Listed as the attendee of a scheduled phone call with the DOJ concerning the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: DOJ Call on Epstein SDNY Investigation
events.description: A scheduled phone call between Linda Singer and the Department of Justice regarding the Southern District of New York's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The Department of Justice was actively discussing the SDNY Epstein investigation as of October 2020.
Linda Singer was in direct communication with the DOJ regarding this investigation.
The communication was scheduled as a personal call, not a formal meeting.
